name: trucksafe-eld-system
description: TruckSafe ELD - Professional Electronic Logging Device System for DOT compliance and intelligent route planning

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python manage.py runserver" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: cd backend && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate

author: Trucking ELD Team
